column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Bone in Rib Eye - The best steak I've ever had in my life. I honestly got a tear in my eye. It was so tender (rare
column4: perfectly seasoned.  My mouth waters thinking of it now
column5: and I'm not being hyperbolic.  Frankly
column6: I'm scared to go back because I'm scared of being disappointed. Also
column7: take the bone home to your dog....Oh
column8: I had a glass of cab with this
column9: I have no idea what. I consider it requisite.
